dct_title_s: Bankokuzu Zen : [Complete map of the World]
dct_description_sm: Akioka ko chizu colekushon mei him ten : [The Exhibition Catalog of the Akioka Old Map Collection], Item #16, Kobe City Museum, Japan, 1989.
California as large island oriented nearly east-west, labelled as "California", and with no interior details.
"Eastern Red Sea" and "New Mexico" to east.
Western hemisphere closely resembles Shuzo Sato map of 1865.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
